response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, we're extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it at a special price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market rate and is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. We're confident this product will meet and exceed your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we'll arrange for immediate delivery. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
